Text Formatting¶

Text Formatting¶

This module provides utilities to perform basic text formatting.

class simpletex.formatting.text.Bold(inline=False)[source]¶

Applies bold formatting to text.

class simpletex.formatting.text.Italics(inline=False)[source]¶

Applies italic formatting to text.

class simpletex.formatting.text.Underline(inline=False)[source]¶

Applies underline formatting to text.

class simpletex.formatting.text.Emphasis(inline=False)[source]¶

Applies emphasis formatting to text.
